briefTitle: LINC00511/miR-185-3p Axis and miR-301a-3p Markers for Breast Cancer Diagnosis
officialTitle: Competitive Endogenous Role of the LINC00511/miR-185-3p Axis and miR-301a-3p From Liquid Biopsy as Molecular Markers for Breast Cancer Diagnosis
primaryOutcomeMeasure: 1. Analyze the expression level of two miRNA (miR-185-3p, miR-301a) and their predicted interacted lncRNA (LINC00511)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* were being an adult female, with breast invasive carcinoma of no specific type, confirmed pathologically

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients with:
* were blood disease, any cancer other than BC, liver cirrhosis, and uterine and urinary bladder diseases, or metastatic BC patients who received chemo/radiotherapy, or had previous mastectomy.
